examples: Come into the warm and get dry, both of you. Ruth felt her mouth go dry. The wells in most villages in the region have run dry. (figurative) Vaccine supplies started to run dry as the flu outbreak reached epidemic proportions.

The river was bone dry. Make sure the paint is thoroughly dry.
(often figurative) The ink was scarcely dry on the ceasefire agreement before fighting broke out again.
The day will start bright and mainly dry.
